tasks.description: Implement IIT‑inspired self‑model metrics and store results in self:experience.
Build a narrative identity tracker that updates persona_memory core traits over time.
Create a meta‑learning loop that periodically re‑indexes research_index.json for new insights.
Develop a hedging‑detector benchmark using the self_observer patterns and reduce false positives by 30%.
Integrate self:experience logging into the main response generation pipeline.
Design a self‑reflection prompt that queries persona_memory for recent emotions and relationships.
Run an experiment in experiments/ folder: simulate conflicting user instructions and observe sycophancy spikes.
Write a utility to export self_patterns.json as a CSV for offline analysis.
Add a scheduled task that reviews the last 100 self:experience entries and suggests trait adjustments.
Document the self‑observation schema and publish a short markdown summary in docs/.
